definitions.definition: To engage in political activity; politick.
A methodology and activities associated with running a government, an organization, or a movement.
The profession of conducting political affairs.
definitions.example: He made a career out of politics.
Their politics are clear from the bumper stickers on their cars.

definitions.definition: Political maneuvers or diplomacy between people, groups, or organizations, especially involving power, influence or conflict.
(singular) Real-world beliefs and social issues irrelevant to the topic at hand.
definitions.example: We're trying to talk about comic books, don't mention politics.
